remarks: Distribute function operation through a sequence.  Note that ` G ( z ) ` is an implicit function on ` z ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Mar-2015.)
statement:
seqof.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
seqof.2 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) $.
seqof.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( F ` x ) = ( z e. A |-> ( G ` x ) ) ) $.
seqof $p |- ( ph -> ( seq M ( oF .+ , F ) ` N ) = ( z e. A |-> ( seq M ( .+ , G ) ` N ) ) ) $.
$d .+ x z $.
$d A x z $.
$d F x z $.
$d G x $.
$d M x z $.
$d N x z $.
$d ph x z $.
